verses.text: \w From|strong="G1537"\w* whence \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w wars|strong="G4171"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* contentions \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*? \w Are|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w hence|strong="G2532"\w*, \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* concupiscences, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w war|strong="G4171"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w*?

\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w covet|strong="G1937"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*: \w you|strong="G5210"\w* kill, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w envy|strong="G2206"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w obtain|strong="G2192"\w*. \w You|strong="G5210"\w* contend \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w war|strong="G4170"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w ask|strong="G0154"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*; \w because|strong="G1360"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* amiss: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* consume \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* concupiscences.

\w Adulterers|strong="G3428"\w*, \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w friendship|strong="G5373"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w enemy|strong="G2190"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*? Whosoever \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w friend|strong="G5384"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, becometh \w an|strong="G1510"\w* \w enemy|strong="G2190"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w do|strong="G1380"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w think|strong="G1380"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* saith \w in|strong="G1722"\w* vain: \w To|strong="G4314"\w* \w envy|strong="G5355"\w* doth \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* covet \w which|strong="G3739"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3004"\w* giveth \w greater|strong="G3173"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*. \w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w he|strong="G3004"\w* saith: \w God|strong="G2316"\w* resisteth \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w proud|strong="G3173"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* giveth \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w humble|strong="G5011"\w*.

\w Be|strong="G2532"\w* \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w resist|strong="G0436"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* fly \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w Draw|strong="G1448"\w* nigh \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w draw|strong="G1448"\w* nigh \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*. \w Cleanse|strong="G2511"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, ye \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w purify|strong="G0048"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, ye double minded.

\w Be|strong="G2532"\w* afflicted, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mourn|strong="G3996"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w weep|strong="G2799"\w*: let \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w laughter|strong="G1071"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w turned|strong="G3344"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w mourning|strong="G3997"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* sorrow.

\w Be|strong="G2532"\w* \w humbled|strong="G5013"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sight|strong="G1799"\w* \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2962"\w* \w exalt|strong="G5312"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

Detract \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w my|strong="G2532"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* detracteth \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* judgeth \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, detracteth \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* judgeth \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, thou art \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w doer|strong="G4163"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w*.

\w There|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w lawgiver|strong="G3550"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w*, \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w destroy|strong="G0622"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w deliver|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* art thou \w that|strong="G3004"\w* judgest thy neighbour? Behold, \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Today|strong="G4594"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="G0839"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w such|strong="G3592"\w* \w a|strong="G4160"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w spend|strong="G4160"\w* \w a|strong="G4160"\w* \w year|strong="G1763"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* traffic, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w gain|strong="G2770"\w*.

Whereas \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1987"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w on|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* morrow.

\w For|strong="G0473"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w life|strong="G2198"\w*? \w It|strong="G4160"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w a|strong="G4160"\w* vapour \w which|strong="G3588"\w* appeareth \w for|strong="G0473"\w* \w a|strong="G4160"\w* little \w while|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* afterwards \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* vanish away. \w For|strong="G0473"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w should|strong="G2198"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*: \w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w will|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w we|strong="G1437"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w*, \w we|strong="G1437"\w* \w will|strong="G2962"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G3956"\w* arrogancies. \w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* rejoicing \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w wicked|strong="G4190"\w*.

\w To|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w who|strong="G0846"\w* knoweth \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* doth \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.
